src:
Awal Pekan, Jakarta Diprediksi Hujan Angin
04 Nov 2019, 08:09 by Rayinda Muhammad Ichwan


Awal Pekan, Jakarta Diprediksi Hujan Angin

KBRN, Jakarta : Badan Meteorologi, Klimatologi dan Geofisika (BMKG) memprakirakan Jakarta diguyur hujan lebat awal pekan ini, Senin (4/10/2019).
Tak hanya itu, BMKG melaporkan hujan yang melanda Ibu Kota juga akan disertai angin kencang di sebagian wilayahnya.
“Waspada potensi hujan disertai kilat/petir dan angin kencang di wilayah Jaksel dan Jaktim pada siang hari,” tulis situs bmkg.go.id.
Adapun suhu hari ini terendahnya berada pada 25 derajat celcius dengan suhu tertinggi berkisar antara 30 hingga 31 derajat celcius.
Jangan lupa membawa payung dan jas hujan agar perjalanan anda terlindung dari hujan. Selamat beraktivitas warga Jakarta!
text:
Early in the Week, Jakarta Predicts Wind Rain
Nov 04 2019, 8:09 AM by Rayinda Muhammad Ichwan


Early in the Week, Jakarta Predicts Wind Rain

KBRN, Jakarta: The Meteorology, Climatology and Geophysics Agency (BMKG) predicts that Jakarta will be poured by heavy rain earlier this week, Monday (4/10/2019).
Not only that, BMKG reports that the rain that hit the capital will also be accompanied by strong winds in some of its regions.
"Be aware of the potential for rain accompanied by lightning / lightning and strong winds in the South Jakarta and East Jakarta regions during the day," wrote the site bmkg.go.id.
The lowest temperature today is at 25 degrees Celsius with the highest temperatures ranging from 30 to 31 degrees Celsius.
Don't forget to bring an umbrella and a raincoat so that your trip is protected from the rain. Congratulations on your Jakarta activity!
